EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_451PivotalVMwareGoogleContainers_AR_Q317.Download Con
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading Pivotal, VMware and Google come together on containers
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Thank you for downloading the 451 Research report: Pivotal, VMware and Google come together on containers. For additional resources, including analyst reports, webinars and eBooks, check out our resources page <[[https://content.pivotal.io/resources]]> and our containers topic page <[[https://pivotal.io/containers]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team For more on everything from Spring to cloud-native to accelerating your application development and more, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]>, taking place this September 24-27th in Washington, D.C. Use code S1P_Discount_100 <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]> and save $100 off the price of admission.
